Class ChebGonazMinion

The ChebGonazMinion class is the basis for all minions. It serves multiple purposes:

  • Identification: To determine whether a creature was created by the mod.
  • Wait/Follow/Roam functionality
  • Ownership functionality
  • Helper methods/functions eg. FindClosest, FindNearby

createdOrder

The order in which minions have been created. This is useful if a limit is set, so that when the limit is reached the oldest minions are killed first.

Declaration

Field Value
Type Description
System.Int32
| Improve this Doc View Source

MinionDropsZdoKey

This ZDO entry contains a list of items and their amounts that the minion will drop on death. This is parsed on the minion's Awake and added to its CharacterDrop component.

Declaration
public const string MinionDropsZdoKey = "UndeadMinionDrops"
Field Value
Type Description
System.String
| Improve this Doc View Source

MinionOwnershipZdoKey

This ZDO entry contains the owner player's name as a string. It won't respond to the commands of other players.

Returns
Type Description
